# AI Output Review Checklist

- [ ] Output matches the task brief and constraints.
- [ ] No hallucinated APIs, files, or dependencies.
- [ ] Uses current versions of libraries and frameworks.
- [ ] Avoids unnecessary complexity or over-engineering.
- [ ] Risks and assumptions are explicitly stated.
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets, keys, or credentials.
- [ ] Reviewer verdict is PASS/FAIL with clear issues listed. (warning)
